title: Skoda SUV contest: Co shortlists 10 names starting with K, winner to get new car & a ticket to Prague
description: Skoda Auto India shortlisted 10 potential names for its new compact SUV, due to launch by March 2025. The final name will be revealed on August 21, 2024. The SUV will rival Maruti Suzuki Brezza and Hyundai Venue, featuring a 1.0-litre turbo petrol engine. Prices are expected to start from Rs 8 lakh ex-showroom.
